Text:
@zakimar: Yeah it's not the name I would have chosen either. :^p
I think it's supposed to mean that it's closer to Mary Shelley's original work than other Frankensteins; the 1992 one with Robert de Niro also tried to do this (and didn't seem to succeed going by the ratings.)
TPB shows zero seeders, probably as I have the "Initial Seed" flag set, but I'll be seeding this for several days so disregard the zero.
TY for the movie! I have been looking for this for YEARS! I think if Frankenstein was for real, this would be him!
thanks very much been looking for this one for ages
I loved this version as a kid!  And it's still great witha star-studded cast.  Thank you so much.  Hope it's still seeding, because I'm about to leech.
